channel.title: Uninstallation Guide | Kubeform on Provision cloud resources using Kubernetes CRDs & Terraform
channel.description: Recent content in Uninstallation Guide | Kubeform on Provision cloud resources using Kubernetes CRDs & Terraform

item.title: Uninstall Kubeform Community Edition
item.description: Uninstall Kubeform Community Edition To uninstall Kubeform Community edition, run the following command: Helm 3 Helm 2 YAML Using Helm 3 In Helm 3, release names are scoped to a namespace. So, provide the namespace you used to install the operator when installing. $ helm uninstall kubeform --namespace kube-system Using Helm 2 $ helm delete kubeform Using YAML (with helm 3) If you prefer to not use Helm, you can generate YAMLs from Kubeform chart and uninstall using kubectl.
